statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 16 \\ 6 \\ -8 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -21 \\ -18 \\ -6 \\ 9 \\ -9 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
